resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81285</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81285</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4542</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Determining the Moisture Content of a Soil Sample</string>
            <string language="es">Determinación del contenido de humedad de una muestra de tierra</string>
            <string language="ga">Cion Taise i Sampla Cré a Thomhais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bestimmung des Feuchtigkeitsgehaltes einer 
Boden-Probe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Détermination de la teneur en humidité d'un 
échantillon de sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determinando o índice de umidade de uma amostra 
do solo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determinazione del tenore d'acqua di un campione 
del terreno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορισμός της περιεκτικότητας σε υγρασία ενός 
εδαφολογικού δείγματος</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Introductory soil science practical requiring students to assess the moisture content of a soil sample. Includes explanatory information.</string>
            <string language="es">Práctica introductoria de ciencias del suelo que requiere que los estudiantes evalúen el contenido de humedad de una muestra de tierra. Incluye información explicativa.</string>
            <string language="ga">Turgnamh réamhrá eolaíochta cré ina chaitheann na daltaí meastóireacht a dhéanamh ar chion taise i sampla cré. Áirítear eolas mínithe leis.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Agricultural Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencias</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolaíocht Talmhaíochta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Experiment</string>
            <string language="es">Agricultura. Experimento</string>
            <string language="ga">Turgnamh</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitende Bodenwissenschaft praktische 
benötigende Kursteilnehmer, zum des Feuchtigkeitsgehaltes einer 
Bodenprobe festzusetzen. Schließt erläuternde Informationen 
ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étudiants d'exigence pratiques préliminaires de
science du sol pour évaluer la teneur en humidité d'un échantillon 
de sol. Inclut l'information explicative.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudantes requerendo práticos introdutórios da
ciência de solo para avaliar o índice de umidade de uma amostra do 
solo. Inclui a informação explanatória.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Allievi richiedenti pratici introduttivi di 
geologia per valutare il tenore d'acqua di un campione del terreno. 
Include le informazioni esplicative.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγικοί πρακτικοί απαιτώντας σπουδαστές 
εδαφολογικής επιστήμης για να αξιολογήσει την περιεκτικότητα σε 
υγρασία ενός εδαφολογικού δείγματος. Περιλαμβάνει τις 
επεξηγηματικές πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Agrarwissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Science Agronomique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérience</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência Agricultural</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza Agricola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωργική επιστήμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πείραμα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
